title: Drawing, Design after Portrait of Regina of Sardinia after Francia; Verso, Anatomical Study, 1811–14
title_raw: Design after Portrait of Regina of Sardinia after Francia; Verso, Anatomical Study
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on recto: ritratto Costanza Enric Regina di Sardegna Figlia di Bentivoglio; at left margin: costume del quattro cento del Francia Belogna; at left lower corner: 75.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Double sided sheet from sketchbook. Recto, figure shown in three-quarter view. Inscription: ritratto Costanza Enric Regina di Sardegna Figlia di Bentivoglio. Inscribed at left margin: costume del quattro cento del Francia Belogna. Inscribed at left bottom corner: 75.  Verso, depiction of right thigh.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design after Portrait of Regina of Sardinia after Francia; Verso, Anatomical Study, 1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1201
